price: Shin, kuna umurnin mutãne da alhẽri, kuma ku manta da kanku alhãli kuwa kuna karatun littãfi? Shin, bãzã ku hankalta ba?
arabic: ۞ أَتَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبِرِّ وَتَنسَوۡنَ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ تَتۡلُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: atamurūna al-nāsa bil-biri watansawna anfusakum wa-antum tatlūna al-kitāba afalā taʿqilūna
